DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective, multi-center, single arm, feasibility study to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of the ReVENT Sleep Apnea System for the treatment of Obstructive Sleep Apnea.
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Study of the ReVENT Sleep Apnea System
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of OSA with AHI 1540 Body Mass Index (BMI) â‰¤ 32 Refused or failed Continuous Positive Airway Pressure (CPAP) Evidence of airway collapse at soft palate and/or base of tongue Prior OSA surgery Anatomy unable to accommodate implants Chronic immunosuppressive therapy or known problems with wound healing Type I or II diabetes Active systemic infection Pregnancy Other major medical conditions that could confound outcome measures or interfere with study completion
